article_title: Harris tells Netanyahu 'it is time' to end war in Gaza
sentence: She  noted  the  conflict  began  on  7  October  when  Hamas  militants  attacked  southern  Israel  from  Gaza,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  250  captives,  according  to  Israeli  tallies.

article_title: Harris tells Netanyahu 'it is time' to end war in Gaza
sentence: Israel's  retaliatory  offensive  in  Gaza  has  killed  more  than  39,000  people.
